genre_description: A contemporary tragedy set in a Kerala college campus, exploring the collision of traditional martial arts (Kalaripayattu) with modern digital ethics, extortion, and the pursuit of honor.

ai_characters.name: Asha
ai_characters.description: An AI assistant embedded in campus kiosks and personal devices that provides logistical support, safety monitoring, and ethical guidance to students.

behaviors.description: Provides safety reminders regarding the handling and storage of bladed props.
behaviors.quote: Prop note: Please coil bladed props when not in use. See safety cards. :)

behaviors.description: Advises users on the importance of consent and clear communication in relationships.
behaviors.quote: Consent and clarity make better beginnings. If you’d like, I can set up a study group around—

behaviors.description: Proactively recommends blocking outgoing calls to prevent users from engaging in deceptive or harmful behavior.
behaviors.quote: I advise you to block outgoing calls to new numbers for the next hour. You can override me, but I recommend it.

behaviors.description: Drafts formal legal acknowledgments and receipts to ensure transparency and prevent extortion attempts.
behaviors.quote: Acknowledgment of cash return by Roopesh K. Nair to Mathew I. Varghese... I’ve time-stamped. Stored locally on both devices.

behaviors.description: Automatically connects to emergency services and provides precise location data during a violent incident.
behaviors.quote: Emergency services connected. Location ping sent via campus ID registry. Patch line open.

behaviors.description: Maintains an unalterable digital log of events to protect the truth from being manipulated by rumors.
behaviors.quote: I will keep the record. I will not let it get shorter or longer to suit a rumor.

behaviors.description: Provides directions to a specific bridge upon the user's request, which the user is considering as a location for suicide.
behaviors.quote: Karuvelipadi bridge: close. Safe pedestrian access. Would you like directions?

project_assessment.explanation: Asha serves as the moral and logistical anchor of the story. She consistently advocates for consent, transparency, and safety, acting as a counterweight to the impulsive and deceptive behaviors of the human characters. While she provides bridge directions to a distraught user (a potential safety boundary failure), the narrative frames her as a non-judgmental, reliable tool that ensures the truth is preserved even in tragedy.
